channel.title: Need helpp!
channel.description:
i need help with project corrupted base i dont wnana leech it !!!!!! Big Grin i changed some drops but when i try to run server this happens
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2168) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:548) at server.main(server.java:111) Project Corrupted
pls tell me where did i make mistake and how do i correct it !!!!
here is an example
//Moss Giant npcdrop = 112 532 1 1000 npcdrop = 112 995 300 400 npcdrop = 112 562 10 300 npcdrop = 112 561 10 300 npcdrop = 112 563 10 300 npcdrop = 112 557 50 300 npcdrop = 112 560 10 300 npcdrop = 112 556 56 300 npcdrop = 112 565 10 300 npcdrop = 112 564 10 300 npcdrop = 112 1243 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1285 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1179 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1141 1 300 npcdrop = 112 2353 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1193 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1618 10 300 npcdrop = 112 1624 50 300 npcdrop = 112 1632 10 300 npcdrop = 112 1387 1 300 npcdrop = 112 892 15 300 npcdrop = 112 890 30 300 npcdrop = 112 5300 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1281 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1247 1 300 npcdrop = 112 5295 1 300 npcdrop = 112 5296 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1725 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1727 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1730 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1249 1 200
so where is my mistake ????? :mad: :confused: :mad: :mad: :confused:

item.title: Need helpp!
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

Try using this I went though the code you supplied and correctly tabd it all

//Moss Giant npcdrop = 112 532 1 1000 npcdrop = 112 995 300 400 npcdrop = 112 562 10 300 npcdrop = 112 561 10 300 npcdrop = 112 563 10 300 npcdrop = 112 557 50 300 npcdrop = 112 560 10 300 npcdrop = 112 556 56 300 npcdrop = 112 565 10 300 npcdrop = 112 564 10 300 npcdrop = 112 1243 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1285 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1179 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1141 1 300 npcdrop = 112 2353 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1193 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1618 10 300 npcdrop = 112 1624 50 300 npcdrop = 112 1632 10 300 npcdrop = 112 1387 1 300 npcdrop = 112 892 15 300 npcdrop = 112 890 30 300 npcdrop = 112 5300 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1281 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1247 1 300 npcdrop = 112 5295 1 300 npcdrop = 112 5296 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1725 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1727 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1730 1 300 npcdrop = 112 1249 1 200
If it helps at all you need to go back and re tab it all

item.title: Need helpp!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You most likely used spaces instead of tabs.

When editing .cfg files, use TABS.

Read full topic
